Today in County Clare, surf is looking solid at 8 ft @ 14s from the WNW with a fresh 17 mph SE wind. Crab Island and Doolin Point are your best bets, especially during their optimal tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 13 ft @ 14s from the WSW and a strong 23 mph WSW wind, making it poor across the board. By the day after, surf improves to 7 ft @ 12s with light 7 mph SSE winds, offering clean options at Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: today.
